title: Just wanted to say about sylas
body:
A lot of people are saying that riot are running out of ideas so they gave him an ult to steal ults 

I personally think this is aimed at LCS mainly ..... A lot of times they take powerful ults that can have map pressure etc such as TF and shen as an example

I believe sylas is here to make people be cautious and think twice about what they take in future so that sylas doesnt steal

replies.body: I think his ult's unreliability will make him very unlikely to see pro play.
